
## Backed API - Boxfull Shiptment API
This is the technical test backend developed with [Nest](https://github.com/nestjs/nest) and docuement with [Sagger](https://swagger.io/).
Provides functionalities related to authentication and creation of shipments, as well as management of the products in each shipment.


## Characteristics
- **Framework:** NestJs
- **Data base:** MongoDB with Prisma ORM
- **Autenticaci√≥n:** JWT (JSON Web Token)
- **Documentatio:** Swagger UI
- **ORM:** Prisma

## Install dependencies

```bash
$ npm install
```
## Setting environment variables
Create a `.env` file in the root of the project with the following variables
```env

DATABASE_URL="mongodb+srv://admin:rYcZ7cVXJ8kHAiOr@boxfull.0jonj.mongodb.net/Boxfull?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Boxful"

JWT_SECRET=''
```

## Synchronizing Prisma with the Database
The database is already configured in a MongoDB cluster and is accessible, you   only need to synchronize the schema with the database and initialize the prisma client

```bash
# synchronization
$ npx prisma bd push

# generate the client Prisma Client Python
$ npx prisma generate
```

## Compile and run the project

```bash
# development
$ npm run start: dev

# watch mode
$ npm run start:dev
```

The server will be available at: http://localhost:4000/
## API Documentation (Swagger)

Once the backend is running, you can access the API documentation generated by Swagger at:

http://localhost:4000/api/document
